body:
The day is here, in a couple of hours the server Ive played on since I can remember will be shutting down for good. I can without a doubt say I’ve made some great memories, and met a great amount of people who I will remember forever. 

This is a personal goodbye from me to the server and to anyone going down with it. Thank you for making these years unforgettable.

<3

title: A final goodbye :)

replies.body:
i came back from the dead just to send a heart. <3

bye bye see u one day
